name: Dior Lady Dior Medium
description: Iconic quilted bag with Cannage pattern and signature Dior charms. A timeless classic.
care_instructions: Store in dust bag. Professional cleaning recommended.
story: Created for Lady Diana in 1995, it became an instant icon.
meta_title: Dior Lady Dior Medium - Iconic Luxury Handbag
meta_description: Classic Dior Lady Dior with Cannage quilting and signature charms

name: Dior Saddle Bag
description: Curved saddle-shaped bag with magnetic closure and adjustable strap.
care_instructions: Clean with soft cloth. Avoid excessive moisture.
story: Inspired by equestrian heritage, relaunched by Maria Grazia Chiuri.
meta_title: Dior Saddle Bag - Contemporary Luxury Bag
meta_description: Dior Saddle bag with curved silhouette and magnetic closure

name: Dior Book Tote
description: Spacious tote in Dior Oblique canvas with leather handles. Perfect for everyday luxury.
care_instructions: Spot clean canvas. Condition leather handles.
story: Features the iconic Dior Oblique pattern created in 1967.
meta_title: Dior Book Tote - Luxury Canvas Tote
meta_description: Dior Book Tote in signature Oblique canvas with leather handles

name: Dior 30 Montaigne Bag
description: Structured bag with CD clasp inspired by the address of the first Dior boutique.
care_instructions: Handle with care. Store in original box.
story: Named after 30 Avenue Montaigne, where Christian Dior opened his first boutique.
meta_title: Dior 30 Montaigne Bag - Heritage Luxury Bag
meta_description: Dior 30 Montaigne bag with CD clasp in box calfskin

name: Dior Caro Bag
description: Modern bag with Cannage quilting and CD turn-lock closure. Contemporary elegance.
story: Named after Christian Dior's sister Catherine, nicknamed Caro.
meta_title: Dior Caro Bag - Modern Luxury Handbag
meta_description: Dior Caro bag with Cannage quilting and CD turn-lock
